snippet.title: DE・JA (デ・ジャ) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

MSX
PC-98
Sharp X68000


Game description:

You play as Ryuusuke, who loves ancient civilizations and treasures. He also loves women ... a lot. That is also what he dreams about, when one day a man comes in and presents him with a mysterious staff. What is this staff about? It is up to Ryuusuke to find out!

DE・JA is a first-person Japanese-style adventure. You visit different places, talk to people, examine things, etc. Once you have what you need (usually by talking to people and exchanging dialogues with them) you will advance to a different screen/location.

The game has some scenes with nudity and mildly depicted sexual situations.
